original_title: I morti rimangono con la bocca aperta
overview: A companion piece to Les Unwanted de Europa (IFFR 2018) and Checkpoint Berlin (IFFR 2020), I morti rimangono con la bocca aperta extends Fabrizio Ferraro's project of retracing the historical footsteps of those fleeing persecution.
title: The Dead Remain with Their Mouths Open
